query.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT, MIN(CS126_UPN) AS UPN, MIN(CS126_CST) AS CST, MIN(CS126_UGS) AS MIN_UGS, MAX(CS126_UMR) AS MAX_UMR FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_PJT = #PJT# AND CS126_HNO = #HNO# AND CS126_UGS >= #UGS# AND -- 시작일자 CS126_UMR <= #UMR# AND -- 종료일자 CS126_DDT = '' WITH UR
